measurements_data.comments: 12; HW value is hazardous component of industrial waste; CandD waste calculated based on the assumption that CandD waste is 4-5 times more than MSW; HCW value for Tehran and Isfahan (10 g/person/day) and Mashhad (6 g/person/day); made on the assumption that hospital waste is ~8-10 percent of MSW
